Performing Transactions

Detailed Description

The output data structure of doTransaction.

This structure is the result of the call to doTransaction. It is returned within ICAdministrationStandAloneDelegate callback function transactionDidEnd. The application should analyze the content of the structure in order to know whether the transaction succeeded or failed.

Field Documentation

unsigned char accountType

The account type used for the transaction. Should be one of the enumerations defined within ICTransactionAccountType

char amount[8]

The real amount used for the transaction

char authorizationNumber[9]

The authorization number

char cardValidity[4]

No longer to be used

char CMC7[35]

No longer to be used

char currency[3]

The currency code in ISO4217 format (the same as in the transaction request)

char FNCI[10]

No longer to be used

char guarantor[10]

No longer to be used

char ISO2[38]

No longer to be used

unsigned char operationStatus

The status of the payment process

char PAN[19]

No longer to be used

unsigned short posNumber

The POS number (should be within the range [0 - 255])

char privateData[10]

Application specific data to be passed to POS application

char zonePriv[10]

Private area

char zoneRep[55]

Response of the cash register connection
